name: AngularCLI
description: Build, tests, lint, e2e an Angular project, or run a custom Angular CLI command.
author: Raul A. Ruiz

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Angular CLI command to run. Select 'Custom' to add arguments or use a command not listed here.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Path to project root
inputs.visibleRule: command = build || command = lint || command = test || command = e2e || command = custom
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the Angular project root, where the package.json and angular.json files are located.

inputs.name: custom
inputs.label: Custom command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to pass to ng for execution.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.visibleRule: command = build || command = lint || command = test || command = e2e || command = custom
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to the selected command if needed. The arguments depend on the command selected.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want execute commands on verbose mode. Equivalent to --verbose on the arguments.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want print extra information for debugging this extension.
